mods.note: KHOR KAWI c b. 1892 Naval Staff I.D Pier and part of Beach, Pier Point Khor Kawi Looking South. General view of buildings. Reading from left to right:— Officers’ Club, Canteen, Caretakers’ Quarters with small Native Cookhouse. In foreground :—Store, Power House, and Water Tanks.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: 1 black and white photograph.Dimensions: 87 x 127mm, on sheet 328 x 202mm.

mods.abstract: Aerial photograph of Khor Kawi [Khawr al Quway‘, Oman], with the pier point highlighted by a caption and an arrow. Photographer unknown. Prepared by naval staff in the Admiralty's Naval Intelligence Division.
